segments.text: Can you play baseball with me today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I can't . I'm sorry . I have to help my mother . We're going to move tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where's the new house ? Is it far from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's not far . It's near our old house .
segments.speaker: S2
